posts.post_content:
I have a few Sovereign 150 HOFers available for trade. Looking to trade for EPDGs and any interesting T206’s.  Currently not collecting any scraps/print oddities. Will also consider bundles for T205 cards in poor-fair shape.

Let me know what you got!

Obviously these aren’t in great shape but they are pretty tough cards to find, especially the Wallace and Tinker which have low pops.

What’s your email address?  I may have some EPDG and T205 commons with difficult backs


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
Just sent a pm with my address
